general.gigTitle: develop software website application with python flask or django

sellerCard.description:
Greetings from Manchester, UK! I'm John, an Avid Data Scientist, ML Expert, and Software Engineer with over 6 years of experience. Skilled in Python, R, JavaScript and Golang. I'm passionate about what I do and thrilled to be here offering my expertise. As a certified AWS Cloud Practitioner and Azure Data Scientist, my expertise includes efficient cloud-based.

If you're looking to bring a project to life or discuss innovative solutions in data science and machine learning, feel free to send me a message. Let's explore how my skills and experience can contribute to the success of your project.

description.content:
Greetings! I'm thrilled to extend my expertise to the vibrant Fiverr community. With a rich background spanning over six years in data science and software development, I am well-equipped to tackle diverse projects with precision and creativity.


Are you looking to create a dynamic web application tailored to your unique specifications? My service encompasses the development of web applications from the ground up, adhering closely to your project requirements.


The technology stack I employ includes:

  • Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, React JS
  • Backend: Python and Go


Every project has its unique demands. Should you require specific technologies or have particular preferences, do not hesitate to inform me. Additionally, I can integrate WordPress APIs to enhance your existing applications.


To ensure a seamless and efficient workflow, I kindly request that you provide a detailed project brief outlining your objectives and the challenges you wish to address. Rest assured, I am committed to responding to your queries within a maximum of two hours.


Looking forward to collaborating with you and bringing your vision to life!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you design a REST API for me
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can. I mostly use Flask or FastAPI to design REST APIs, but we can discuss what you prefer and I can work with that

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you work with our software team?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can also work with your software engineers to actualise your goal if required

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also maintain the application?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This is available on request, please write me with more specific details

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you automate our workflow with Python
Can you handle both front and back end development

reviews.comment: I investigated the reviews for John prior to reaching out to him. I was impressed by the glowing reviews that were left. After working with John, I understand the reason for all of the great reviews. John was able to quickly commit to a short deadline and deliver a script for API calls very quickly. This work took a great stress off of the plates of our IT department that has numerous high-profile projects occurring at the same time. It was an absolute pleasure to work with John. He was a wonderful professional.

John was an absolute pleasure to work with in my software development project. He not only exceeded my expectations with his code expertise and attention to detail but also delivered everything on time while being polite and cooperative throughout the collaboration. Highly recommend him!
John was extremely patient with a previous hoster who was completely intrasigent and didn't communicate, when migrating the website but still got the job done.
John the developer was extremely patient in a difficult and timeconsuming job. I heartily recommend him, any day of the week.

Very knowledgeable and has a good understanding of our technology stack:  Jinja, HTMx and the template we will be using. Also took a call on off hours because I was late which I appreciated. 

Will purchase from him again!!
